Description.First: I'm a hardworking, just graduated software engineer looking for job opportunities. I recently discovered that I have a strong interest in frontend development, even more than backend, although I am proficient in both.
Description.Second: As for my work experience, I spent 1 year working for the company 'CleanUp,' where my team and I built an application for cleaning management. Further details can be found in my portfolio.
Description.Third: I'm eager to learn and ready to use what I've learned in a company. I consider myself to be adaptable, responsible and friendly.

CleanUp.Title: CleanUp
CleanUp.Description: This project started as part of my final degree project. Within the project, I took on various roles, such as mobile developer (React native), web developer (React) and UX/UI designer.

Description.First: Frequent training due to high turnover of cleaning staff.
Description.Third: Accidents occur which impact on hygiene quality and can take a long time to be reported and resolved.
Description.Fourth: Difficulties in keeping a record of what has been cleaned.

Solution.Title: The solution
Solution.Description: The solution was to create a web application for managers and a mobile application for cleaners. Everything revolves around QR codes that are placed in each space of a building and that are unique to each of them.

Procedures.Title: Procedures
Procedures.Description: Managers can configure how spaces should be cleaned. The QR codes (placed in the building) can then be scanned by the cleaners to read the cleaning procedure for the space they are going to clean.

Alerts.Title: Alerts
Alerts.Description: If an accident occurs, such as spilling coffee or running out of toilet paper, anyone can scan the QR code located in the space where it occurred and report it. A notification will be sent to the building manager to assign a cleaner, who will receive a notification and can resolve it as soon as possible.

Calendar.Title: Calendar
Calendar.Description: Managers can create a schedule of tasks and assign them to cleaners. Cleaners can access their assigned tasks for the day and mark them as completed, thus maintaining a record of the cleaned areas.

Expensify.Title: Expensify
Expensify.Description: Web and mobile application for expense management in a family created as an academic project .

Categories.Title: Categories
Categories.Description: Categories can be created to differentiate expenses according to them. This division is then used to extract metrics.

Expenses.Title: Expenses
Expenses.Description: Expenses can be recorded and shared with family members. These include a name, date, category, and a photo of the invoice if desired.

ContactMe.Title: Get in touch
ContactMe.Description: If you are interested in my profile or have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me!
